    • Method Detail

      • applyForMentorship

        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_USERS\')")
@PostMapping("/")
public MessageResponse applyForMentorship​(@RequestBody @Validated
                                          ApplicationDTO applicationDTO)

        Apply For a Mentorship As a Mentor -- Endpoint

        Users supply a "valid" Application DTO in the body of the request to apply to be a mentor. This endpoint is just an ambassador, it maps the DTO object to an Entity object and calls the "addMentorshipApplication" function in "ApplicationService" class.
        Parameters:
        applicationDTO - : Contains the information of applicant username, subject and experience of the applicant upon subject.
        Returns:
        MessageResponse: Returns "SUCCESS" after successful operation or "ERROR" with a reason.
        See Also:
        ApplicationDTO, MessageResponse

      • deleteMentorshipApplication

        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_USERS\')")
@DeleteMapping("/")
public MessageResponse deleteMentorshipApplication​(@RequestBody @Validated
                                                   ApplicationDTO applicationDTO)

        Delete a Mentorship As a Mentor -- Endpoint

        Users supply a "valid" Application DTO in the body of the request to delete previous mentorship application.
        This endpoint is just an ambassador, it calls the "deleteMentorshipApplication" function in "ApplicationService" class.
        Parameters:
        applicationDTO - : Contains the information of applicant username and subject of the applicant upon subject.
        Returns:
        MessageResponse: Returns "SUCCESS" after successful operation or "ERROR" with a reason.
        See Also:
        ApplicationDTO, MessageResponse

      • allApplications

        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_ADMINS\')")
@GetMapping("/all")
public java.util.List<ApplicationDTO> allApplications()

        List All Mentorship Applications As an Admin -- Endpoint

        Admins can see all the mentorship applications in the system as a list. It maps MentorshipApplication objects returned from service class to DTO's.
        Returns:
        List: Returns all the mentorship applications as a list.
        See Also:
        ApplicationDTO

      • applicationsByStatus

        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_ADMINS\')")
@GetMapping("/")
public java.util.List<ApplicationDTO> applicationsByStatus​(@RequestParam
                                                           java.lang.String status)

        Filter out Mentorship Applications By Their Status And List Them As an Admin -- Endpoint

        Admins can filter out the mentorship applications in the system by their status and see them as a list. It maps MentorshipApplication objects returned from service class to DTO's.
        Parameters:
        status - : status of the application. May be one of the following: open - approved - rejected - full
        Returns:
        List: Returns the mentorship applications whose status equals to the param as a list.
        See Also:
        ApplicationDTO

      • subjectsUserCanEnrollAsAMentee

        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_USERS\')")
@GetMapping("/{username}/can")
public java.util.List<ApplicationDTO> subjectsUserCanEnrollAsAMentee​(@PathVariable
                                                                     java.lang.String username)

        List All Mentorship Applications One Can Enroll As a Mentee -- Endpoint

        Users can see all the subjects and their mentors they can enroll.
        This endpoint calls the "findSubjectsUserCanEnrollAsAMentee" function of service class and maps the returned value from there.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the mentee.
        Returns:
        List: Returns the subjects and mentors offered that mentee can enroll .
        See Also:
        ApplicationDTO

      • approveMentorshipApplication

        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_ADMINS\')")
@PutMapping("/approve")
public MessageResponse approveMentorshipApplication​(@RequestBody @Validated
                                                    ApplicationDTO applicationDTO)

        Approve a Mentorship Application As an Admin -- Endpoint

        Admins can approve an application if they think mentor applicant is suitable for the purpose.
        This endpoint acts as an ambassador and returns the "approveMentorshipApplication" function of service class.
        Parameters:
        applicationDTO - : Information of the application.
        Returns:
        MessageResponse: SUCCESS upon successful operation, ERROR with an explanation otherwise.
        See Also:
        ApplicationDTO

      • rejectMentorshipApplication

        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_ADMINS\')")
@PutMapping("/reject")
public MessageResponse rejectMentorshipApplication​(@RequestBody
                                                   ApplicationDTO applicationDTO)

        Reject a Mentorship Application As an Admin -- Endpoint

        Admins can reject an application if they think mentor applicant is not capable enough.
        This endpoint acts as an ambassador and returns the "rejectMentorshipApplication" function of service class.
        Parameters:
        applicationDTO - : Information of the application.
        Returns:
        MessageResponse: SUCCESS upon successful operation, ERROR with an explanation otherwise.
        See Also:
        ApplicationDTO

      • updateMentorshipApplication

        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ROLE_USERS\')")
@PutMapping("/update")
public MessageResponse updateMentorshipApplication​(@RequestBody @Validated
                                                   ApplicationDTO applicationDTO)

        Update a Mentorship Application Experience As a User -- Endpoint

        Users can update the experience section of their application.
        This endpoint acts as an ambassador and returns the "updateMentorshipApplication" function of service class.
        Parameters:
        applicationDTO - : Information of the application.
        Returns:
        MessageResponse: SUCCESS upon successful operation, ERROR with an explanation otherwise.
        See Also:
        ApplicationDTO
